quotes.quote: On the day we left, we burned down the family home and all the familiar things inside. Because some memories aren't meant to leave traces.
If you don't share someone's pain. You can never understand them.
They are those who come and go as they please. Even so, once you come to know them, even though there's no one else who notices them, it's a precious encounter that will keep your heart strong.
History is not merely a linear collection of points that we pass through on a timeline. They are connected by a line. No, perhaps it is more accurate to say that they are made to connect.
